code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import Mechanic from'./presentational';import{setPlayer as _setPlayer,setGender as _setGender,setScore as _setScore}from'../actions';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{player:state.player,gender:state.gender,score:state.score};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{setPlayer:function setPlayer(player){return dispatch(_setPlayer(player));},setGender:function setGender(gender){return dispatch(_setGender(gender));},setScore:function setScore(score){return dispatch(_setScore(score));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Mechanic);
